pit
Class datastore

lucee.Component
        pit.datastore

public class datastore

extends lucee.Component

Handles all requests to /datastore/*.

Method Summary
remote any addDatastore([string user_id])
          Creates a datastore based on the passed FORM parameters
remote any deleteDatastore([numeric datastore_id])
          Deletes the datastore with the passed datastore_id
remote any editDatastore([string datastore_id])
          Edit datastore with the passed datastore_id
remote any getDatastore([string id])
          Returns the datastore with the given id
private query getDatastoreById([numeric id])
          Private function to return a datastore based on the passed id
private query getDatastoreByTitle([string datastore_title], [struct user], [numeric datastore_id])
          Private function to return a datastore based on the title
private query getDatastoreByUrl([string datastore_url], [struct user], [numeric datastore_id])
          Private function to return a datastore by the passed url
 
Methods inherited from class lucee.Component
 

Method Detail

addDatastore

remote any addDatastore([string user_id])
Creates a datastore based on the passed FORM parameters. Performs unique checks for the datastore title and datastore url. POST /rest/datastore/ { datastore_title:'Test Datastore', datastore_url:'http://datastore.com' }

Parameters:
user_id

deleteDatastore

remote any deleteDatastore([numeric datastore_id])
Deletes the datastore with the passed datastore_id. Will provide an error if the datastore_id doesn't exist. Will provide an error if the datastore is associated with a project/region still

Parameters:
datastore_id

editDatastore

remote any editDatastore([string datastore_id])
Edit datastore with the passed datastore_id. Performs unique checks for datastore title and datastore url

Parameters:
datastore_id

getDatastore

remote any getDatastore([string id])
Returns the datastore with the given id. GET /rest/datastore/734

Parameters:
id

getDatastoreById

private query getDatastoreById([numeric id])
Private function to return a datastore based on the passed id

Parameters:
id

getDatastoreByTitle

private query getDatastoreByTitle([string datastore_title], [struct user], [numeric datastore_id])
Private function to return a datastore based on the title. Used when checking for unique datastore titles

Parameters:
datastore_title
user
datastore_id

getDatastoreByUrl

private query getDatastoreByUrl([string datastore_url], [struct user], [numeric datastore_id])
Private function to return a datastore by the passed url. Used when performing a unique check on the datastore url

Parameters:
datastore_url
user
datastore_id
